title: Windows 10 league lag
body: I just a few days ago upgraded to windows 10 and as soon as i did my league just lags constantly, its pretty much unplayable now, i used to sit at 35ish ping now it sit around 100 and spike higher than that, ive seen early reports that others have this too, does anyone know how to fix it

replies.body: I'd really like some help with it
